results.title: Cardioprotective effects of amlodipine in the ischemic-reperfused heart.
results.text_hl: Cardioprotective effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ in the @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002545 @@@ischemic@@@-reperfused heart.

citations.NLM: Hoff PT, Tamura Y, Lucchesi BR. Cardioprotective effects of amlodipine in the ischemic-reperfused heart. Am J Cardiol. 1989 Nov 7;64(17):101I-115I discussion 115I-116I. PMID: 2530882

results.title: [Tolerance of amlodipine in left ventricular dysfunction of ischemic origin].
results.text_hl: [Tolerance of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ in @DISEASE_Ventricular_Dysfunction_Left @DISEASE_MESH:D018487 @@@left ventricular dysfunction@@@ of @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002545 @@@ischemic@@@ origin].

citations.NLM: Feder JM, Metzger JP, Georges JL, Tabone X, Etienne D, Albarède P, de Vernejoul P, Vacheron A. [Tolerance of amlodipine in left ventricular dysfunction of ischemic origin]. Arch Mal Coeur Vaiss. 1996 Mar;89(3):305-10. PMID: 8734182

results.title: Effectiveness and safety of valsartan/amlodipine in hypertensive patients with stroke
results.text_hl: This is a subanalysis of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ from the China Status II study, aimed to evaluate the effectiveness and safety of @CHEMICAL_Valsartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068756 @@@valsartan@@@/@<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ (Val/Aml) single-pill combination (SPC) in @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with different @DISEASE_Stroke @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@ subtypes (@DISEASE_Hemorrhage @DISEASE_MESH:D006470 @@@hemorrhagic@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002545 @@@ischemic@@@, or mixed).

citations.NLM: Zhang W, Song Y, Xu J. Effectiveness and safety of valsartan/amlodipine in hypertensive patients with stroke Medicine (Baltimore). 2017 Jun;96(26):e7172. PMID: 28658108
citations.BibTeX: @article{28658108, title={Effectiveness and safety of valsartan/amlodipine in hypertensive patients with stroke}, author={Zhang W and Song Y and Xu J}, journal={Medicine (Baltimore)}, volume={96}, number={26}, pages={e7172}}

results.title: Anti-ischemic effects of amlodipine in patients with stable angina pectoris and myocardial ischemia during daily life. Amlodipine Study Group.
results.text_hl: Ambulatory electrocardiographic monitoring was used to assess the anti-@<m>DISEASE_Brain_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002545 @@@ischemic@@@ effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ in a subset of 56 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ enrolled in a 14-week withdrawal study; @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ therapy resulted in a marked decrease in the overall mean number of @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002545 @@@ischemic@@@ events and the average number of transient @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002545 @@@ischemic@@@ episodes (p <0.005).

citations.NLM: Deedwania PC. Anti-ischemic effects of amlodipine in patients with stable angina pectoris and myocardial ischemia during daily life. Amlodipine Study Group. Am J Cardiol. 1999 Apr 1;83(7):1117-9, A8-9. PMID: 10190530
citations.BibTeX: @article{10190530, title={Anti-ischemic effects of amlodipine in patients with stable angina pectoris and myocardial ischemia during daily life. Amlodipine Study Group.}, author={Deedwania PC}, journal={Am J Cardiol}, volume={83}, number={7}, pages={1117-9, A8-9}}

results.title: An update on the safety of amlodipine.
results.text_hl: It is concluded that @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ is an antihypertensive and anti-@<m>DISEASE_Brain_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002545 @@@ischemic@@@ agent that has the combined advantages of a good safety profile with once-daily dosage and a smooth onset and long duration of action.

citations.NLM: Osterloh IH. An update on the safety of amlodipine. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 1991;17 Suppl 1():S65-8. PMID: 16296714
citations.BibTeX: @article{16296714, title={An update on the safety of amlodipine.}, author={Osterloh IH}, journal={J Cardiovasc Pharmacol}, volume={17 Suppl 1}, pages={S65-8}}

results.title: Beneficial actions of amlodipine in the multiple-stunned canine myocardium.
results.text_hl: In addition, @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ attenuated the loss of @CHEMICAL_Adenine_Nucleotides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000227 @@@adenine nucleotides@@@ in the @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002545 @@@ischemic@@@-reperfused area at 1 hour of reperfusion.

citations.NLM: Gross GJ, Pieper GM. Beneficial actions of amlodipine in the multiple-stunned canine myocardium. Cardiovasc Drugs Ther. 1992 Feb;6(1):67-75. PMID: 1533534
citations.BibTeX: @article{1533534, title={Beneficial actions of amlodipine in the multiple-stunned canine myocardium.}, author={Gross GJ and Pieper GM}, journal={Cardiovasc Drugs Ther}, volume={6}, number={1}, pages={67-75}}

results.title: Amlodipine pretreatment and the ischemic heart.
results.text_hl: The results show that @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ pretreatment supplied protection, provided that the @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002545 @@@ischemic@@@ episode did not exceed 30 minutes.

citations.NLM: Nayler WG. Amlodipine pretreatment and the ischemic heart. Am J Cardiol. 1989 Nov 7;64(17):65I-69I; discussion 69I-70I. PMID: 2530887
citations.BibTeX: @article{2530887, title={Amlodipine pretreatment and the ischemic heart.}, author={Nayler WG}, journal={Am J Cardiol}, volume={64}, number={17}, pages={65I-69I; discussion 69I-70I}}

results.title: [An ergometric cross-over evaluation of the anti-ischemic efficacy of amlodipine and gallopamil in stable angina of effort].
results.text_hl: [An ergometric cross-over evaluation of the anti-@<m>DISEASE_Brain_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002545 @@@ischemic@@@ efficacy of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Gallopamil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005711 @@@gallopamil@@@ in @DISEASE_Angina_Stable @DISEASE_MESH:D060050 @@@stable angina of@@@ effort].

citations.NLM: Perticone F, Borelli DA, Pugliese F, Maio R, Costa R, Cosco C, Ceravolo R, Mattioli PL. [An ergometric cross-over evaluation of the anti-ischemic efficacy of amlodipine and gallopamil in stable angina of effort]. Cardiologia. 1993 Jul;38(7):455-62. PMID: 8221740

results.title: Effects of amlodipine on myocardial ischemia-reperfusion injury in dogs.
results.text_hl: There were no significant differences between groups in @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002545 @@@ischemic@@@ bed size or hemodynamics although dP/dt was higher after @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ administration.

citations.NLM: Gross GJ, Farber NE, Pieper GM. Effects of amlodipine on myocardial ischemia-reperfusion injury in dogs. Am J Cardiol. 1989 Nov 7;64(17):94I-100I. PMID: 2530891
citations.BibTeX: @article{2530891, title={Effects of amlodipine on myocardial ischemia-reperfusion injury in dogs.}, author={Gross GJ and Farber NE and Pieper GM}, journal={Am J Cardiol}, volume={64}, number={17}, pages={94I-100I}}

results.title: Nimodipine improves the disruption of spatial cognition induced by cerebral ischemia.
results.text_hl: Also, in in vivo experiments, the effects of @CHEMICAL_Nimodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009553 @@@nimodipine@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, a noncentral Ca antagonist, on @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002545 @@@cerebral ischemia@@@ models developing by different mechanisms were compared.

citations.NLM: Taya K, Watanabe Y, Kobayashi H, Fujiwara M. Nimodipine improves the disruption of spatial cognition induced by cerebral ischemia. Physiol Behav. 2000 Jul 1-15;70(1-2):19-25. PMID: 10978473
